articles.title: NHS England invites people aged 56 to 59 to book COVID-19 vaccinations in coming week - Reuters
articles.description: NHS England has invited people aged 56 to 59 to book COVID-19 vaccinations in the coming week, with letters to 850,000 people in that age bracket landing on doorsteps from Saturday and another 850,000 due to land Monday.

articles.title: 'Weight isn't always within your control': Why some states are prioritizing obesity patients for the COVID-19 vaccine - Yahoo! Voices
